name: Project: Repel (Version B)
description:
Project: Repel is a game that was developed and designed by Artūrs Svars as the game programmer and Rihards Kurts as art designer. It was a bachelors project and was developed in a time span of 3 months.

Project: Repel is a FPS, horror game. In this game, the player has to escape from the mines while fighting against monster that can only attack the player in dark ares. The player is able to fight the monster away using the light of a flashlight, as well as shoot them with a gun, although ammo is limited.

Version B of this game is different in that the game has only one enemy that chases the player, and unlike in the A version the enemy can not be killed but only be fended off with a successful shots.
